short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the definition of selected words

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension enables you to instantly find the meaning of any selected English word. It also displays the parts of speech the selected word can represent, along with their corresponding meanings. It works across various Chrome tabs, extending its functionality to platforms like WhatsApp Web, Instagram, etc., subject to the restrictions applicable at that moment. Sit back and enable this extension when you want to have a peaceful e-book read or an article read without having to switch tabs to look up for a meaning. Pin the extension if necessary.
